meanings.definition: Having spots or marks on the surface.
meanings.sent1: The dalmatian had the spottiest coat in the whole litter.
meanings.sent2: The leopard's fur was the spottiest of all the animals in the jungle.
meanings.sent3: The spottiest banana in the bunch was saved for the monkey's snack.
meanings.sent4: Her spottiest dress was perfect for the polka dot themed party.
meanings.sent5: The spottiest ladybug landed on the sunflower petal.

meanings.definition: Showing inconsistency or unevenness in quality or performance.
meanings.sent1: The spottiest student in the class aced one test and failed the next.
meanings.sent2: The weather in spring is the spottiest, with sunny days followed by sudden rain showers.
meanings.sent3: The spottiest chef in the kitchen burnt one dish and made a delicious dessert.
meanings.sent4: Her mood swings were the spottiest, going from laughter to tears in minutes.
meanings.sent5: The spottiest Wi-Fi connection made it hard to stream movies without interruptions.
